data.name: Liesl White (she/her)
data.bio: Full Stack Software Developer with a background in customer administration and support, risk management, and team leadership. A proactive team player that identifies long term goals through short term priorities. Strengths include problem-solving, leadership, and effective communication skills.

data.name: Jonathan Rumsey
data.bio: I am a full-stack javascript developer and an accomplished systems administrator, with a certificate in software testing and an associates degree in network technology. I came to appreciate coding while learning PowerShell to streamline my systems administrator tasks. I have since built projects in C# and Python. I enjoy participating in group projects designing and building solutions that leave a positive impact on its customers.

data.name: Simon Son
data.bio: Hi, my name is Simon Son. I am currently studying to become a software developer. I served in the Army for 4 years and earned my degree in human development at UC Davis. While working as a sales manager, I always looked for something new to learn in the tech industry and discovered a deep interest in programming languages during the onset of the pandemic.
